product_name: The North Face Canyonwall Fleece Vest - Men's
long_description: If spring or fall weekends find you climbing or hiking, you'll appreciate the warm, wind-resistant technical fleece that is The North Face Canyonwall Vest for men. Wind-resistant, 100% polyester vest has a heather-jersey face and grid-fleece backing. Brushed-tricot collar lining adds extra warmth and next-to-skin comfort. Reverse-coil center front zipper; adjustable hem; elastic-bound cuffs. The North Face Canyonwall Vest for men features zippered hand pockets.
short_description: If spring or fall weekends find you climbing or hiking, you'll appreciate the warm, wind-resistant technical fleece that is The North Face Canyonwall Vest for men.
